metadata.title: Portuguese Vocabulary Placement Test
metadata.description: Comprehensive diagnostic test focusing on Portuguese vocabulary across everyday topics and contexts

questions.pt: Eu como arroz e feijão todos os dias
questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: I eat rice and beans every day
options: I eat rice and beans every day
I eat rice and beans sometimes
I am eating rice and beans

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: I want to live here now

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: I work on the second day

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: My birthday will be in January

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: I like to travel in July
I want to travel in July

questions.question: What does this mean?
options: I will be born on May 10

questions.en: The book is under the table
questions.question: Complete the sentence:
What does this mean?
options: I will go to bed at 10pm

questions.pt: Eu bebo leite todos os dias
questions.question: What does this mean?
What does this mean?
questions.correct: The table is in the living room
options: The table is in the living room
The table was in the living room
The table is in the room
My table is in the living room
A table is in the living room
The desk is in the living room
